name: Robo Rush (BladeDragoon7575)
description:
Defeat the bosses in this fast paced boss rush! They have been generated using their surroundings, and they want to destroy everything in sight! Stop them before they go any more out of control!

Assets used:

-Kenney Game Assets 1 (by Kenney)

-8-Bit Sound Effects [100+ SFX] (by Beep Yeah!)

-Mixcraft 8 Home Studio music loops

Music editing and mastering made by Daniel "St. Pinkie" Anthony
